SENT.plain: We present a 42-year-old woman with unexpected coma after laparoscopic partial hepatectomy
Further investigation revealed a patent foramen ovale
Cryptogenic stroke arising from a paradoxical carbon dioxide embolism was diagnosed
After 5 days of intensive care, she made a near complete recovery
Perioperative stroke, paradoxical emboli during surgery, patent foramen ovale, carbon dioxide cerebral embolism and therapeutic strategies are discussed
